# Deprecations

This file tracks deprecated public APIs in **py-devrev**.

## How to use

- When deprecating a public API, add an entry here.
- Use `@deprecated(...)` from `devrev.utils.deprecation` on the deprecated symbol.
- Provide a clear replacement path and (when possible) a minimal migration snippet.

## Deprecation log

| Feature | Deprecated In | Removal Target | Replacement | Notes |
|--------|---------------|----------------|-------------|-------|
